name: 2-Player Bow Arena [unfinished fragment]
description:
HERE BE DRAGONS: This is a game that was never meant to be released in this state. As such, the quality may be subpar and the game might be full of bugs. It might even randomly crash.

A game submitted to the Fragment Jam.  A local co-op game made in Unity back in 2013. Surprisingly, the process of importing it into a more recent version of Unity was easy so there's a WebGL version!

You need at least one gamepad to be able to play this game. It has only been tested with Xbox360 & Xbox One controllers, so I'm not sure if others will work.
You can play it with a friend, a lover or a pet if you have a second gamepad.

Controls (Gamepad only):
Controllers need to be connected before launching the game. (yes, it's janky)

Left Analog: Move
Right Analog: Aim
Right Bumper / R1: Shoot Arrow
